description: Number of primitive (period n) n-bead necklace structures using a maximum of six different colored beads.
comments: Turning over the necklace is not allowed. Colors may be permuted without changing the necklace structure.a(n) = A107424(n, 1)+A107424(n, 2)+...+A107424(n, 6). - _David Wasserman_, May 31 2005
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
formula: sum mu(d)*A056294(n/d) where d|n and n>0.
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
